casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Joseph MOORE. No. 460A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Michael Johnson, Assistant District Attorney, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of August 2006 by Defendant to Extend Time for Court Reporters to Prepare Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 2nd day of October 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
